subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Bruce Halliday on my Ghost to Ghost PM show
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-1224567325-1200169205=:65458
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Mike:
              I can't wait to hear Steve as well!  I will diffently be a great interview!!!  Those are some pretty big shoes for me to step into after having them both on.  That would be a hard act to follow!
   
  Juli

"M.A. Coletta (Mike)" <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
          Thanks, Juli...

Next week (Tuesday) Steve H. has agreed to be my guest. Should be 
another good talk!
How about you? I have an opening for my Tuesday, Jan 22nd show at 7 
pm mountain time.. :-)

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, juli velazquez <ghostchasingfool@...> 
wrote:
>
> Great interview! I just want to thank you for getting the word out 
so that we can all continue our journey into the unknown.
> 
> Juli
> 
> "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
> Hey.. it was my honor and pleasure to have our very own 
Bruce Halliday 
> on my Ghost to Ghost PM internet radio show tonight.
> Bruce has helped many of us here, and was kind enough to give me 2 
> hours of his time. You can hear that show here:
> http://www.ghosttoghostpm.com
> It will begin playing automatically once you are on the website.
> 
> Thanks...
> - Mike
> 
> 
> 
>
